export_view.value:
Complimentary complimentary copies of PC-SPAN® software can be downloaded through CME Core by all users. To download a copy, log on to CME Core with your CME Group Login, or create a new one, and download the software.  Please note SPAN Risk Manager is now complimentary and available via instance download from CME CORE.

For questions about downloading the software from CME CORE, please contact the CME CORE Support Team:

cme.core@cmegroup.com 

+1 (312) 580-5353

To purchase other versions of SPAN (SPAN Real-Time Component Interface) or SPAN Risk Manager Clearing) contact the SPAN Licensing team:

SpanLicensing@cmegroup.com
